body_html:
FWIW there is now gradle+cmake+Makefile support for the Android TF JNI inference library under tensorflow/contrib/android/cmake, which may make things easier for you.

Full support for the demo should be coming at some point as well.
body_text:
FWIW there is now gradle+cmake+Makefile support for the Android TF JNI inference library under tensorflow/contrib/android/cmake, which may make things easier for you.
Full support for the demo should be coming at some point as well.
body:
FWIW there is now gradle+cmake+Makefile support for the Android TF JNI inference library under [tensorflow/contrib/android/cmake](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/android/cmake), which may make things easier for you.

Full support for the demo should be coming at some point as well.
